document.docAuthor: Mikátová, Šárka, Macháčková, Lenka & Hájek, Jiří
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of type specimens of beetles (Coleoptera) deposited in the National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of type specimens of beetles (Coleoptera) deposited in the National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic

subSubSection.paragraph: The holotype and one paratype are deposited in NMPC
(general collection and ex coll. L. Hromádka):

PHILONTHUS s. str.
/ brendelli sp. n. / Hromádka, det. 2006. [p, orange label]’.

PA*©A*´YPൾ (): ‘Quango Gebiet / v. Mechow. [p, violet label] // ex coll. L. Hromádka / National Museum / Prague , Czech Republic [p] // PARATYPUS /
PHILONTHUS s. str.
/ brendelli sp. n. / Hromádka, det. 2006. [p, orange label]’.
Current status. Valid species.

subSubSection.paragraph: The holotype is deposited in NMPC (general collection):

HƟĿƟ*´YPൾ (): ‘ [p, red label] // ETHIOPIA – Bale / Sabsebe Washa N Park / 07 °03′N 39 ° 39É [sic!] / 3.600 m 1971 [p] // ex coll. L. Hromádka / National Museum / Prague, Czech Republic [p] // HO- LOTYPUS /
PHILONTHUS

subSubSection.paragraph: The holotype is deposited in NMPC (ex coll. L. Hromádka):

HƟĿƟ*´YPൾ (): ‘ [p, red label] // VR Congo ,4,30° / S/ 13,96°O , 210m / Bouansa,3.5.85 / lux,leg.Bremer [p] // ex coll. L. Hromádka / National Museum / Prague , Czech Republic [p] // HOLOTYPUS /
PHILONTHUS
( s. str.) / camelus sp. n. / L. Hromádka, det. 2006 [p, red label]’.
Current status. Valid species.

Comments. According to the original description, H*©ƟMǍĐĸA (2008c) described
P. camelus
based on the holotype from ‘ TANZANIA (‘Allemande’) Afrique or., Kilimandjaro , versant sud-est, Alluaud-Jeannel’. However, the holotype specimen in Hromádka’s collection has the locality label from Congo (see above). As the voucher specimen agrees well with the original description and
